![Unlock Joins Gitcoin GG23: Supporting Open-Source Innovation](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/76d7936077430e409d2b7b058ebd7ea9.jpg)

<h2 id="h-what-is-gitcoin-and-gg23" class="text-3xl font-header"><strong>What is Gitcoin and GG23</strong></h2><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.gitcoin.co/">Gitcoin</a> is a pioneering platform that connects developers and open-source contributors with funding opportunities. Through its innovative <strong>quadratic funding model</strong>, Gitcoin ensures that projects receive proportionally higher funding if supported by many, not necessarily by the amount itself. Since its inception, Gitcoin has distributed over <strong>$59 million</strong> to support <strong>public goods</strong>, fostering the development of<strong> open-source</strong> technologies that <strong>benefit everyone</strong>. </p><p>Most of what enables us to use the Internet freely today is because it was built on open-source technology. We take it for granted until it is no more. So let's ensure that even with a small amount, we support what matters to us now and in the future!</p><br><h2 id="h-why-supporting-unlock-protocol-matters" class="text-3xl font-header"><strong>Why Supporting Unlock Protocol Matters</strong></h2><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/42161/867/100">Unlock Protocol</a> is an open-source infrastructure that revolutionizes how memberships, ticketing, certifications, recurring subscriptions and more are created and distributed. It enables creators, developers, and community organizers to tokenize memberships using NFTs, offering a decentralized, frictionless alternative to traditional platforms. The protocol is peer-governed by its UP token holders, open-source and can be used for free to enable equal access to everyone.</p><p>By supporting <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/42161/867/100">Unlock Protocol</a> in the GG23 funding round, donors contribute to a tool that democratizes access, reduces costs, and promotes transparency in web monetization. This aligns with the broader ethos of open-source development—empowering communities through shared ownership and governance.</p><p>Open-source projects like ours partially rely on community funding to sustain our growth and innovation. Supporting such initiatives ensures the continued availability of free tools that drive technological progress and foster inclusivity in the digital economy. </p><br><h2 id="h-how-to-support-us-in-the-gg23-funding-round" class="text-3xl font-header"><strong>How to Support Us in the GG23 Funding Round</strong></h2><p>There are several ways to support Unlock Protocol during the Gitcoin GG23 round, and while donations are appreciated (can be just $1), we understand that not everyone might be able to. So here are more suggestions on how you can support us:</p><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/42161/867/100"><strong>Donate Directly</strong></a><strong>:</strong> Visit the link to the Gitcoin platform and select Unlock Protocol as your grantee (gets added to the shopping cart). Donations can be made using ETH or other supported cryptocurrencies via wallets like MetaMask or Trust Wallet on Arbitrum.</p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/gitcoin/status/1908981286871675063">Stake your GTC</a>: This round features a new way to support the project you believe in by staking your GTC token. It’s a way to signal support without donating and help determine how $18K in rewards gets distributed. </p></li><li><p><strong>Share on Socials:</strong>&nbsp;Share, like, and comment on our social media posts on <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/unlock-protocol-dao/">LinkedIn</a> and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/UnlockProtocol">X</a> so they gain more traction and reach a wider network of potential supporters. Your action matters!</p></li><li><p><strong>Tell your Friends:</strong> Share information about <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/42161/867/100">Unlock Protocol’s</a> participation in GG23 within your network to encourage more community involvement. For further information, send them this article.</p><br></li></ul><h2 id="h-key-dates-for-gg23" class="text-3xl font-header"><strong>Key Dates for GG23</strong></h2><p>The Gitcoin GG23 funding round runs from <strong>April 2 to April 17, 2025</strong>. During this period, donors can contribute to their chosen projects and influence how matching funds are distributed. Be sure to act before the round closes to maximize your impact.</p><p>By participating in GG23, you’re not just supporting us—you’re investing in the future of open-source innovation and decentralized tools like <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/42161/867/100">our Protocol</a>.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-joins-gitcoin-gg23--supporting-open-source-innovation/c4f34c5121b5638f2ccba6958449d2d3.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="676" nextwidth="1201" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><br><h2 id="h-live-with-lets-grow-dao" class="text-3xl font-header">Live with Let's Grow DAO</h2><p>Unlock DAO Lead Steward <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/stella-achenbach-9a57722b/">Stella Achenbach</a>, Marketing Steward <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/cecilia-contreras-castro/">Ceci Sakura</a> and DAO Member <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/wonderwomancode/">Wonderwomancode</a> are live every other day on <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/LetsGROWdao">X spaces with Let's Grow DAO</a>.</p><p>Fixed hosting times from Unlock Protocol DAO are Monday, Wednesday and Friday at 6 pm EST. Join us and get ready to get your own GROWPass powered by Unlock if you are as terrible as us in remembering the "<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/LetsGROWdao/status/1909387417053724812">GROWcabulary</a>" rules of the space.
